# Guy Mainwaring Morton

Guy Mainwaring Morton (1896â€“1968) was a barrister and writer who wrote crime novels under the pen name of Peter Traill.
He married Clare, the daughter of the Hartlepool ship-owner M.H. Horsley, in 1923.
